constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 93 (Friday, May 27, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. NORTON:
H.R. 7893.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
clause 18 of section 8 of article I of the Constitution.
[Page H5221]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

title: To direct the Secretary of Transportation to submit a report on helicopter and rotorcraft noise in the District of Columbia, and for other purposes.
